name: Broken Space (itch)
description:
This game was made in a couple of days for the Major Jam 4: Cosmic Game Jam! We actually had 7 days but I am nothing if not an expert procrastinator!

The goal is to get 1,000,000 points. This is easier said than done so good luck. Control descriptions are in the options menu. 

Have fun with it and stay awesome!
